text:
@WhiteHouse @ICEgov 135,000+ dead from Coronavirus 
Accepted Russian help in election 
Attempted to extort Ukraine in armed conflict with Russians 
Insulted & damaged relations with our allies, while sucking up to authoritarians
Russian bounties on US

You belong in prison!
